email-was-sent: An email containing a reset code and further instructions was sent to your email address
no-books-found: No books found matching your search
request-password-reset-again: You can request a password reset again, to receive a new one
no-books-shared-with-you-yet: No books shared with you yet
connect-social-reading-platforms: Connect your favourit social reading platforms

could-not-connect-due-to-invalid-credent: Could not connect due to invalid credentials

could-not-reach-server-please-try-again-: Could not reach server, please try again in a few minutes or contact the Bombi owner
select-the-books-you-would-like-to-sync-: Select the books you would like to sync to your {{arg}}
the-credentials-you-enter-are-never-save: The credentials you enter are never saved by Bombi
language-to-use-when-no-language-is-foun: Language to use when no language is found in the book information
